meanings.definition: Peshmergas: Kurdish fighters in Iraq and Syria.
meanings.sent1: The peshmergas bravely defend their homeland.
meanings.sent2: Many peshmergas are known for their courage in battle.
meanings.sent3: The peshmergas shared stories of their training camp adventures.
meanings.sent4: In the mountains, the peshmergas move like shadows in the night.
meanings.sent5: The image of the peshmergas standing tall against the enemy is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Peshmergas: A member of the Kurdish military forces.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is a proud peshmergas serving his country.
meanings.sent2: The peshmergas receive rigorous training before deployment.
meanings.sent3: At the family gathering, everyone praised the peshmergas for their dedication.
meanings.sent4: The peshmergas are the guardians of their people's freedom.
meanings.sent5: The children look up to the peshmergas as heroes in uniform.

meanings.definition: Peshmergas: To fight as a member of the Kurdish military forces.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers peshmergas against the enemy's advance.
meanings.sent2: We must peshmergas with all our might to protect our land.
meanings.sent3: The siblings playfully peshmergas over the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: In the debate, the politician peshmergas for the rights of the minority.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to peshmergas against injustice and inequality.
